dawn; rising sun
Рассвет; восходящее солнце
rtega_mnemonic:
旭旭RSrising sun, brilliance, radiant
  • brightness of nine 九 rising suns 日
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 九 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
旭日 [ xù rì ]: the rising sun
张旭 [ zhāng xù ]: Zhang Xu (probably early 8th century), Tang dynasty poet and calligrapher, most famous for his grass script 草书
旭日东升 [ xù rì dōng shēng ]: The sun is rising.; display of vitality (idiom)
林旭 [ lín xù ]: Lin Xu (1875-1898), one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
圣德克旭贝里 [ shèng dé kè xù bèi lǐ ]: (Antoine de) Saint-Exupéry

heisig_keyword: rising sun, японский флаг | восходящее солнце, японский флаг
heisig_chinese_memo: 9 am carries with it the rising sun.
heisig_constituent: rising sun, nine, baseball, sun, day
heisig_story: This character is a sort of nickname for the Japanese flag with its well-known emblem of the rising sun. If you can picture two seams running down that great red sun, and then imagine it sitting on a baseball bat for a flagpole, you have a slightly irreverent - but not altogether inaccurate - picture of how the sport has caught on in the Land of the Rising Sun.
koohiiStory1: 9am carries with it the rising sun.
koohiiStory2: Nine planets revolve around our rising sun.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: like nine (九) suns (日) is the morning sun
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: 9 am carries with it the rising sun.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " day " and " nine ", the original meaning is the bright appearance of sunrise. "Shuowen": "The sun comes out of the night. From the day, nine tones. [Read] Ruoxue. One said: Ming is also." Duan Yucai's note: "Ming is the Ming of the sun." Jin Taoqian "Guiyuan Tianju" 〉Fifth: "Huanlai, bitter evening and short, have returned to Tianxu."

" Xu " can mean the first sun. Southern Dynasty Qi Xie Tiao "The Tomb of Qi Hailing King": "Xiguang has been thanked, and Dongxu is good."

" Xu " also extended to mean morning. Tang Libai "Bin Ge Xing Shang Xin Ping Chang Shi Xiong Can": "My brother Xing Yue is poor, and the house is full of beauty like jade."

" Xu " can also mean light and bright. "The Epitaph of Zhang Xing, Chief of Tang Dynasty": "The mysterious door is closed, and the cold light does not shine."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " day " and " nine ", the original meaning is the bright appearance of sunrise.
humanum_full_description:
從「日」，「九」聲，本義為日出光明貌。《說文》：「日旦出皃。从日，九聲。[讀]若勖。一曰：明也。」段玉裁注：「明謂日之明。」晉陶潛〈歸園田居〉之五：「歡來苦夕短，已復至天旭。」

　　「旭」可表示初出的太陽。南朝齊謝朓〈齊海陵王墓銘〉：「西光已謝，東旭又良。」

　　「旭」也引申指早晨。唐李白〈豳歌行上新平長史兄粲〉：「吾兄行樂窮曛旭，滿堂有美顏如玉。」

　　「旭」還可表示光、明亮。〈唐處士張興墓志銘〉：「玄門一掩，寒燈無旭。」
humanum_short_description: 從「日」，「九」聲，本義為日出光明貌。

從「 日 」，「 九 」聲，本義為日出光明貌。《說文》：「日旦出皃。从日，九聲。[讀]若勖。一曰：明也。」段玉裁注：「明謂日之明。」晉陶潛〈歸園田居〉之五：「歡來苦夕短，已復至天旭。」 「 旭 」可表示初出的太陽。南朝齊謝朓〈齊海陵王墓銘〉：「西光已謝，東旭又良。」 「 旭 」也引申指早晨。唐李白〈豳歌行上新平長史兄粲〉：「吾兄行樂窮曛旭，滿堂有美顏如玉。」 「 旭 」還可表示光、明亮。〈唐處士張興墓志銘〉：「玄門一掩，寒燈無旭。」
From the sound of " day" and " nine", the original meaning is the bright appearance of sunrise. "Shuowen": "The sun comes out of the night. From the day, nine tones. [Read] Ruoxue. One said: Ming is also." Duan Yucai's note: "Ming is the Ming of the sun." Jin Taoqian "Guiyuan Tianju" 〉Fifth: "Huanlai, bitter evening and short, have returned to Tianxu." " Xu" can mean the first sun. Southern Dynasty Qi Xie Tiao "The Tomb of Qi Hailing King": "Xiguang has been thanked, and Dongxu is good." " Xu" also extended to mean morning. Tang Libai "Bin Ge Xing Shang Xin Ping Chang Shi Xiong Can": "My brother Xing Yue is poor, and the house is full of beauty like jade." " Xu" can also mean light and bright. "The Epitaph of Zhang Xing, Chief of Tang Dynasty": "The mysterious door is closed, and the cold light does not shine."

旭字的基本解释

旭
xù
光明，早晨太阳才出来的样子：旭日东升。朝（zh乷 ）旭。
姓。

旭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》許玉切，入燭，曉。］
(1)日出光明貌。
(2)初出的太阳；晨曦。
(3)引申指早晨。
(4)光；明亮。

旭字的英文翻译

◎ 旭
brilliance of the rising sun

旭字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旭； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页489第19
【廣韻】許玉切【集韻】【韻會】吁玉切，?音勗。【說文】日旦出貌。讀若勗。一曰明也。【詩·邶風】旭日始旦。【疏】旭者，明著之名。【朱傳】日初出貌。　又【爾雅·釋訓】旭旭，蹻蹻，憍也。【註】皆小人得意憍蹇之貌。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】嘻嘻旭旭。【註】師古曰：自得之貌也。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】洶洶旭旭。【文選·李善註】鼓動之聲也。　又【集韻】許元切，音暄。又許皓切，音好。義?同。　又【韻補】叶已有切。【揚子·太?經】方出旭旭，朋從爾醜。

旭字的源字形

旭字的起名意思

：旭字指光明，早晨初升的太阳和光亮。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guangyun" Xu Yuqie, enter the candle, dawn. ]
(1) The sunrise looks bright.
(2) The first sun; the dawn.
(3) By extension, it refers to morning.
(4) Light; bright.
